en-AU.summary: Victoria Public Transport Tracker is a skill that provides real-time public transportation information for Victoria, Australia.
examplePhrases: next train at Richmond station from City
next train at Richmond station to City
en-AU.name: Victoria Public Transport Tracker
en-AU.description: Victoria Public Transport Tracker is a skill that provides real-time train information for Victoria, Australia. You can ask for the next train from your home station, or the next train to a specific station. You can also ask for the next train on a specific line. Victoria Public Transport Tracker is not affiliated with Public Transport Victoria.
